20101225073228.000|20101225073229.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20101225073228.000|20101225073229.000|CC1|>> CHARLIE: BORN SHAWN CARTER,  
20101225073229.000|20101225073229.000|CC1|JAY-Z IS ONE OF THE MOST        
20101225073229.000|20101225073230.000|CC1|SUCCESSFUL ENTERTAINERS         
20101225073230.000|20101225073230.000|CC1|AROUND.                         
20101225073230.000|20101225073233.000|CC1|HIS ALBUMS HAVE SOLD 50         
20101225073233.000|20101225073236.000|CC1|MILLION COPIES WORLDWIDE.       
20101225073236.000|20101225073237.000|CC1|EACH OF HIS 11 RECORDS HAS      
20101225073237.000|20101225073238.000|CC1|REACHED THE TOP OF THE U.S.     
20101225073238.000|20101225073238.000|CC1|CHARTS, GIVING HIM MORE NUMBER  
20101225073238.000|20101225073239.000|CC1|ONE ALBUMS THAN ANYONE BUT THE  
20101225073239.000|20101225073240.000|CC1|BEATLES.                        
20101225073240.000|20101225073244.000|CC1|HE HAS WON 10 GRAMMY AWARDS,    
20101225073244.000|20101225073246.000|CC1|10 MTV VIDEO AWARDS, NINE       
20101225073246.000|20101225073246.000|CC1|B.E.T.  HIP-HOP AWARDS AND      
20101225073246.000|20101225073252.000|CC1|THREE AMERICAN MUSIC AWARDS.    
20101225073252.000|20101225073322.000|CC1| ??                             
20101225073322.000|20101225073339.000|CC1|??                              
20101225073339.000|20101225073340.000|CC1|>> CHARLIE: JAY-Z HAS           
20101225073340.000|20101225073341.000|CC1|LEVERAGED HIS SUCCESS IN THE    
20101225073341.000|20101225073345.000|CC1|STUDIO INTO A BUSINESS EMPIRE.  
20101225073345.000|20101225073350.000|CC1|FROM 2005-2007 HE WAS PRESIDENT 
20101225073350.000|20101225073352.000|CC1|OF DEF-JAM                      
20101225073352.000|20101225073352.000|CC1|RECORDS, ARE A JOB CALLED THE   
20101225073352.000|20101225073353.000|CC1|HIP-HOP OVAL OFFICE, CURRENTLY  
20101225073353.000|20101225073355.000|CC1|PRESIDENT AND C.E.O. OF ROCK    
20101225073355.000|20101225073355.000|CC1|NATION BUT HIS ASCENT TO        
20101225073355.000|20101225073356.000|CC1|STARDOM ORIGINATED IN HUMBLE    
20101225073356.000|20101225073358.000|CC1|AND TROUBLED BEGINNINGS.        
20101225073358.000|20101225073405.000|CC1|HIS LIFE STARTED IN BROOKLYN'S  
20101225073405.000|20101225073406.000|CC1|MARSEY PROJECTS WHERE POVERTY   
20101225073406.000|20101225073407.000|CC1|AND CRACK COCAINE CONSUMED      
20101225073407.000|20101225073407.000|CC1|YOUTH.                          
20101225073407.000|20101225073408.000|CC1|HIS FATHER LEFT HOME WHEN HE    
20101225073408.000|20101225073408.000|CC1|WAS WHICH LEFT HIS MOTHER TO    
20101225073408.000|20101225073410.000|CC1|RAISE FOUR CHILDREN ALONE.      
20101225073410.000|20101225073412.000|CC1|DURING HIS TEEN YEARS HANGING   
20101225073412.000|20101225073414.000|CC1|OUT ON THE STREET, HIS HUNGER   
20101225073414.000|20101225073415.000|CC1|FOR MUSIC OFTEN TOOK A BACK     
20101225073415.000|20101225073418.000|CC1|SEAT TO SELLING CRACK.          
20101225073418.000|20101225073419.000|CC1|TODAY, JAY-Z CREDITS RAP MUSIC  
20101225073419.000|20101225073425.000|CC1|WITH SAVING HIS LIFE.           
20101225073425.000|20101225073426.000|CC1|IN HIS NEW BOOK, "DECODED," HE  
20101225073426.000|20101225073427.000|CC1|WRITES ABOUT HOW HIP-HOP TOOK   
20101225073427.000|20101225073427.000|CC1|HIM OFF THE STREETS AND         
20101225073427.000|20101225073428.000|CC1|PROVIDED AN OUTLET FOR HIS      
20101225073428.000|20101225073430.000|CC1|AMBITION AND HIS ANGER.         
20101225073430.000|20101225073431.000|CC1|I SPOKE WITH JAY-Z LAST MONTH   
20101225073431.000|20101225073432.000|CC1|AT THE BROOKLYN MUSEUM FOR A    
20101225073432.000|20101225073438.000|CC1|LIVE AUDIENCE.                  
20101225073438.000|20101225073440.000|CC1|THE INTERVIEW TOOK PLACE JUST   
20101225073440.000|20101225073441.000|CC1|A FEW MILES FROM THE BEDFORD    
20101225073441.000|20101225073442.000|CC1|STUYVESANT NEIGHBORHOOD WHERE   
20101225073442.000|20101225073443.000|CC1|HE WAS BORN AND RAISED.         
20101225073443.000|20101225073444.000|CC1|WE HAD DONE AN INTERVIEW A FEW  
20101225073444.000|20101225073446.000|CC1|YEARS AGO WHERE HE TALKED       
20101225073446.000|20101225073447.000|CC1|ABOUT HIMSELF BUT THIS IS A     
20101225073447.000|20101225073448.000|CC1|MOMENT WHEN, AFTER THE          
20101225073448.000|20101225073449.000|CC1|PUBLICATION OF THIS BOOK HE     
20101225073449.000|20101225073455.000|CC1|WAS COMING TO THE BROOKLYN      
20101225073455.000|20101225073455.000|CC1|MUSEUM, THIS GIANT AND          
20101225073455.000|20101225073456.000|CC1|HISTORIC BUILDING THAT HOUSES   
20101225073456.000|20101225073457.000|CC1|ART IN ITS GRANDEUR, A PLACE    
20101225073457.000|20101225073457.000|CC1|THAT SEEMS FAR DIFFERENT FROM   
20101225073457.000|20101225073458.000|CC1|HIS LIFE AND HIS MUSIC, BUT IT  
20101225073458.000|20101225073502.000|CC1|IS A PLACE THAT WELCOMED THIS   
20101225073502.000|20101225073502.000|CC1|HOMETOWN HERO, THAT NIGHT, AND  
20101225073502.000|20101225073504.000|CC1|AS WE WALKED THROUGH THIS       
20101225073504.000|20101225073508.000|CC1|BUILDING YOU GOT A SENSE OF     
20101225073508.000|20101225073509.000|CC1|WHO HE IS.                      
20101225073509.000|20101225073510.000|CC1|HERE IS PART OF OUR             
20101225073510.000|20101225073514.000|CC1|CONVERSATION.                   
20101225073514.000|20101225073515.000|CC1|I HAVE IN MY HAND JAY-Z         
20101225073515.000|20101225073517.000|CC1|"DECODED."                      
20101225073517.000|20101225073519.000|CC1|DECODED BECAUSE IT'S ABOUT      
20101225073519.000|20101225073519.000|CC1|DECODING RAP AND IT'S ABOUT     
20101225073519.000|20101225073523.000|CC1|DECODING WHAT ELSE?             
20101225073523.000|20101225073524.000|CC1|>> THE CENTRAL THEME IS ABOUT   
20101225073524.000|20101225073528.000|CC1|DECODING THESE RAP LYRICS.      
20101225073528.000|20101225073530.000|CC1|BUT IN ORDER TO REALLY DECODE   
20101225073530.000|20101225073531.000|CC1|THEM, I HAD TO TELL THE STORY   
20101225073531.000|20101225073532.000|CC1|OF THE GENERATION AND           
20101225073532.000|20101225073533.000|CC1|EVERYBODY THAT GREW UP AROUND   
20101225073533.000|20101225073535.000|CC1|THAT TIME.                      
20101225073535.000|20101225073539.000|CC1|I HAD TO TELL THAT STORY.       
20101225073539.000|20101225073542.000|CC1|SO IT'S BASED ON THE LYRICS     
20101225073542.000|20101225073543.000|CC1|BUT IT'S A LOT MORE -- IT'S A   
20101225073543.000|20101225073547.000|CC1|VERY DIFFICULT BOOK TO EXPLAIN  
20101225073547.000|20101225073548.000|CC1|IN THAT WAY, BUT IT'S REALLY    
20101225073548.000|20101225073549.000|CC1|THE STORY OF A GENERATION OF    
20101225073549.000|20101225073550.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT GREW UP DURING A    
20101225073550.000|20101225073552.000|CC1|ERA THAT WAS VERY DIFFICULT.    
20101225073552.000|20101225073554.000|CC1|>> CHARLIE: YOU STARTED A BOOK  
20101225073554.000|20101225073603.000|CC1|BEFORE AND THEN YOU PULLED      
20101225073603.000|20101225073604.000|CC1|BACK ON IT BECAUSE YOU THOUGHT  
20101225073604.000|20101225073605.000|CC1|IT WAS TOO PERSONAL.            
20101225073605.000|20101225073605.000|CC1|WHY DID YOU DECIDE NOW IS THE   
20101225073605.000|20101225073606.000|CC1|TIME FOR ME TO WRITE A BOOK?    
20101225073606.000|20101225073607.000|CC1|>> THAT BOOK WAS BASICALLY --   
20101225073607.000|20101225073607.000|CC1|IT WAS MORE PERSONAL.           
20101225073607.000|20101225073609.000|CC1|IT WAS A LITTLE -- A LITTLE     
20101225073609.000|20101225073610.000|CC1|TOO PERSONAL.                   
20101225073610.000|20101225073610.000|CC1|>> Charlie: WHAT DOES THAT      
20101225073610.000|20101225073611.000|CC1|MEAN?                           
20101225073611.000|20101225073612.000|CC1|>> IT WAS VERY DIFFICULT TO     
20101225073612.000|20101225073613.000|CC1|READ MYSELF.                    
20101225073613.000|20101225073613.000|CC1|I'M USUALLY A VERY PRIVATE      
20101225073613.000|20101225073621.000|CC1|PERSON.                         
20101225073621.000|20101225073621.000|CC1|BUT THIS ONE HAD A BIGGER       
20101225073621.000|20101225073622.000|CC1|PURPOSE, BECAUSE -- YOU KNOW,   
20101225073622.000|20101225073623.000|CC1|WHILE I WAS DECODING THESE      
20101225073623.000|20101225073623.000|CC1|LYRICS TO EXPLAIN RAP AS        
20101225073623.000|20101225073624.000|CC1|POETRY, IT TOLD THE STORY OF A  
20101225073624.000|20101225073626.000|CC1|GENERATION.                     
20101225073626.000|20101225073627.000|CC1|IT WAS MUCH MORE THAN JUST A    
20101225073627.000|20101225073628.000|CC1|BOOK ABOUT ME, YOU KNOW, IT     
20101225073628.000|20101225073630.000|CC1|CAPTURED A TIME PERIOD, ALL     
20101225073630.000|20101225073631.000|CC1|THESE THINGS HAPPENING -- I     
20101225073631.000|20101225073633.000|CC1|THOUGHT IT WAS MORE IMPORTANT   
20101225073633.000|20101225073635.000|CC1|TO HAVE THAT BOOK THAN THE      
20101225073635.000|20101225073636.000|CC1|BLACK BOOK -- THAT WAS THE      
20101225073636.000|20101225073636.000|CC1|NAME OF IT.

20101225073639.000|20101225073640.000|CC1|A GENERATION A MEANS OF         
20101225073640.000|20101225073645.000|CC1|EXPRESSING THEMSELVES.

20101225073646.000|20101225073647.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WHO DIDN'T HAVE NO   
20101225073647.000|20101225073647.000|CC1|VOICE, AND PUT THINGS INTO      
20101225073647.000|20101225073649.000|CC1|CONTEXT.                        
20101225073649.000|20101225073652.000|CC1|IF YOU HEAR A SONG, YOU MIGHT   
20101225073652.000|20101225073653.000|CC1|HAVE TO BLEEP THIS OUT ON, YOU  
20101225073653.000|20101225073654.000|CC1|HEAR A SONG LIKE THE POLICE BY  
20101225073654.000|20101225073656.000|CC1|M.W.A., UNTIL YOU SEE THE       
20101225073656.000|20101225073658.000|CC1|RODNEY KING BEATING YOU DON'T   
20101225073658.000|20101225073659.000|CC1|REALLY UNDERSTAND THE CONTEXT   
20101225073659.000|20101225073700.000|CC1|IN WHICH THEY'RE SAYING IT,     
20101225073700.000|20101225073703.000|CC1|YOU THINK IT'S JUST M.W.A.,     
20101225073703.000|20101225073708.000|CC1|YOU THINK IT'S JUST WITH        
20101225073708.000|20101225073709.000|CC1|ATTITUDE -- JUST -- JUST        
20101225073709.000|20101225073713.000|CC1|REALLY -- BEING PROVOCATIVE,    
20101225073713.000|20101225073715.000|CC1|BUT ONCE WE SAW -- YOU KNOW,    
20101225073715.000|20101225073716.000|CC1|WE SAW THAT, WE WAS LIKE,       
20101225073716.000|20101225073717.000|CC1|"WAIT, MAYBE THIS IS REALLY     
20101225073717.000|20101225073723.000|CC1|HAPPENING, MAYBE THIS HAPPENS   
20101225073723.000|20101225073724.000|CC1|DAILY" AND IT WAS, IT WAS A     
20101225073724.000|20101225073728.000|CC1|THING THAT WAS HAPPENING, SO    
20101225073728.000|20101225073728.000|CC1|FOR US, IT GAVE A VOICE TO A    
20101225073728.000|20101225073729.000|CC1|GENERATION OF PEOPLE WHO        
20101225073729.000|20101225073730.000|CC1|DIDN'T HAVE A VOICE, WHO WERE   
20101225073730.000|20101225073731.000|CC1|IGNORED, WHO DIDN'T GET THE     
20101225073731.000|20101225073732.000|CC1|BEST SCHOOLING, WHO DIDN'T GET  
20101225073732.000|20101225073736.000|CC1|THE BEST ROADS, WHO             
20101225073736.000|20101225073737.000|CC1|POLITICIANS NEVER PAY           
20101225073737.000|20101225073738.000|CC1|ATTENTION TO, NOW THEY CAN      
20101225073738.000|20101225073740.000|CC1|HEAR OURSELVES -- WE HEARD      
20101225073740.000|20101225073744.000|CC1|OURSELVES, I'M NOT REMOVED      
20101225073744.000|20101225073745.000|CC1|FROM THAT, HEAR OURSELVES ON    
20101225073745.000|20101225073746.000|CC1|NOT RADIO AND HEAR OUR STORY    
20101225073746.000|20101225073747.000|CC1|THROUGH THESE SONGS.            
20101225073747.000|20101225073751.000|CC1|>> Charlie: YOU WOULDN'T BE     
20101225073751.000|20101225073753.000|CC1|SITTING IN THAT CHAIR IF YOU

20101225073759.000|20101225073801.000|CC1|YOU KNEW IN YOUR GENERATION

20101225073801.000|20101225073804.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.

20101225073809.000|20101225073810.000|CC1|HAD A TALENT.

20101225073824.000|20101225073825.000|CC1|A PERSONAL FRIEND OF MINE, YOU  
20101225073825.000|20101225073827.000|CC1|KNOW, WENT TO JAIL FOR 12

20101225073833.000|20101225073834.000|CC1|AWAITING ME -- WE WOULD HAVE

20101225073854.000|20101225073855.000|CC1|>> MY MOTHER IS HERE TODAY.     
20101225073855.000|20101225073856.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]

20101225081003.000|20101225081007.000|CC1|>> Charlie: TELL US THE STORY   
20101225081007.000|20101225081008.000|CC1|WHEN I THINK IT HAD TO DO WITH

20101225081020.000|20101225081023.000|CC1|GOING IN THE WRONG TRAJECTORY   
20101225081023.000|20101225081025.000|CC1|BECAUSE HE WAS ARGUABLY THE     
20101225081025.000|20101225081029.000|CC1|BIGGEST RECORDING ARTIST ON     
20101225081029.000|20101225081030.000|CC1|THE PLANET AT THAT TIME.        
20101225081030.000|20101225081031.000|CC1|HE HAD SOLD 10 MILLION RECORDS

20101225081040.000|20101225081041.000|CC1|A UNDERGROUND RAPPER LIKE HE

20101225081734.000|20101225081735.000|CC1|THAT'S NOT LOVE.                
20101225081735.000|20101225081737.000|CC1|THAT'S YOU'RE THINKING.         
20101225081737.000|20101225081738.000|CC1|THAT'S TRYING TO BE             
20101225081738.000|20101225081740.000|CC1|SUCCESSFUL.                     
20101225081740.000|20101225081741.000|CC1|I WANT TO MAKE THE CLUB SONG,   
20101225081741.000|20101225081748.000|CC1|THE PARTY SONG, THE GIRL SONG,  
20101225081748.000|20101225081749.000|CC1|THE DOG SONG, THE WHATEVER      
20101225081749.000|20101225081750.000|CC1|SONG, WHEN YOU'RE MAKING MUSIC  
20101225081750.000|20101225081751.000|CC1|LIKE THAT, YOU KNOW, THE        
20101225081751.000|20101225081752.000|CC1|SOUTHERN SONG -- -- WHEN        
20101225081752.000|20101225081755.000|CC1|YOU'RE MAKING MUSIC LIKE THAT,  
20101225081755.000|20101225081756.000|CC1|THAT'S NOT ABOUT LOVE, YOU'RE   
20101225081756.000|20101225081757.000|CC1|THINKING -- THE BLUEPRINT WAS   
20101225081757.000|20101225081758.000|CC1|MADE OUT OF LOVE, IT WAS MADE   
20101225081758.000|20101225081801.000|CC1|OUT OF FEELING, IT WAS MADE     
20101225081801.000|20101225081803.000|CC1|OUT OF THIS YOUNG LADY'S        
20101225081803.000|20101225081806.000|CC1|APARTMENT AND ALL THE MUSIC     
20101225081806.000|20101225081807.000|CC1|SHE PLAYED AND GETTING -- I'M   
20101225081807.000|20101225081808.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT MY MOTHER RIGHT   
20101225081808.000|20101225081814.000|CC1|NOW -- THAT SORT OF EMOTION.    
20101225081814.000|20101225081816.000|CC1|IT WAS JUST -- IT WAS MADE FOR

20101225082309.000|20101225082312.000|CC1|I'M HERE IS TO HAVE CERTAIN     
20101225082312.000|20101225082314.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITIES THAT MOST PEOPLE

20101225082333.000|20101225082337.000|CC1|SUCH AND SUCH AND SO FORTH AND  
20101225082337.000|20101225082337.000|CC1|HE BECOMES WHO HE IS.

20101225082345.000|20101225082351.000|CC1|OF OPPORTUNITY, I THINK IT'S    
20101225082351.000|20101225082351.000|CC1|MY -- SOMETHING I HAVE TO DO.   
20101225082351.000|20101225082352.000|CC1|WATER IS ANOTHER THING THAT'S   
20101225082352.000|20101225082357.000|CC1|IMPORTANT TO ME BECAUSE --      
20101225082357.000|20101225082400.000|CC1|WATER, I MEAN, IT'S THE MOST    
20101225082400.000|20101225082401.000|CC1|BASIC OF NEEDS.                 
20101225082401.000|20101225082401.000|CC1|AND TO KNOW THAT SO MANY

20101225082406.000|20101225082409.000|CC1|ON THE LIST, IT'S LIKE WATER,   
20101225082409.000|20101225082411.000|CC1|IT'S LIKE -- SAD, YOU KNOW,     
20101225082411.000|20101225082415.000|CC1|AND ON A HUMAN LEVEL, EVERYONE

20101225082415.000|20101225082416.000|CC1|I MEAN, WE ALL BELIEVE THAT,    
20101225082416.000|20101225082417.000|CC1|AND SO JUST OPPORTUNITY IN
